section.title: Assessment of Anti-Bribery and Corruption Risk

form.question: Is the Company a government body? Or does it have any known ties to a government body?
Is there anything unusual in the payment structure/process?
form.prompt:
Please identify any/all applicable options form the following:
(1) Substantial up-front payment 
(2) Fees/commission above market rate 
(3) Cash payment 
(4) Payment through other party or country
(5) Other (Please provide details).

form.question: Is there anything unusual about the selection process of the Company?
form.prompt: i.e. third party was not determined through competitive selection.

form.question: Will the Company be processing or have access to any personal data on behalf of FT, including but not limited to those stated?
form.prompt: Definition of personal data: Any data that FT can link to an individual, even if the supplier won't be able to identify any individuals by name - for example, contact details or IP addresses. It also includes data sent in encrypted form, even if the supplier won't be able to decrypt it.

form.question: Will the service(s) or product(s) be using any tracking data, e.g. cookies or pixels?
Will the Company be contacting individuals on behalf of FT by email, post or phone?
Will the Company be storing personal data on behalf of FT?

child_questions.question: Please state which country the data will be stored.

form.question: Will a transfer of personal data (including payment card information) be taking place to a Country outside the EEA?

child_questions.question: Please outline: What data will be transferred?
What security is in place? e.g. encryption.
